body_content.explanation: without a cover or covering on it:
examples: The child fell down the uncovered drain while playing on a building site near his home.
The sun was beating down on her uncovered head and she needed to move into the shade.

body_content.explanation: not protected by insurance (= an agreement in which you pay a company money and they pay your costs if you have an accident, injury, etc.):
examples: That year agriculture companies and farmers faced at least £3.6 billion in uncovered losses due to natural disasters.
